verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְעֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֬ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David נְאֻֽם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith פֶּ֣שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> The transgression לָ֭רָשָׁע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> within לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> my heart אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There פַּ֥חַד <S%H6343><s%> [that there is] no fear אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> before his eyes

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֶחֱלִ֣יק <S%H2505><s%> For he flattereth אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> about בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> himself in his own eyes לִמְצֹ֖א <S%H4672><s%> be found עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> until his iniquity לִשְׂנֹֽא׃ <S%H8130><s%> to be hateful

דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> The words פִ֭יו <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth אָ֣וֶן <S%H205><s%> [are] iniquity וּמִרְמָ֑ה <S%H4820><s%> and deceit חָדַ֖ל <S%H2308><s%> he hath left off לְהַשְׂכִּ֣יל <S%H7919><s%> to be wise לְהֵיטִֽיב׃ <S%H3190><s%> [and] to do good

אָ֤וֶן ׀ <S%H205><s%> mischief יַחְשֹׁ֗ב <S%H2803><s%> He deviseth עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מִשְׁכָּ֫ב֥וֹ <S%H4904><s%> upon his bed יִ֭תְיַצֵּב <S%H3320><s%> he setteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> himself in a way לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that is] not good רָ֝֗ע <S%H7451><s%> not evil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִמְאָֽס׃ <S%H3988><s%> he abhorreth

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בְּהַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> [is] in the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> Thy mercy אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> [and] thy faithfulness עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <S%H7834><s%> [reacheth] unto the clouds

צִדְקָֽתְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H6666><s%> Thy righteousness כְּֽהַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> mountains אֵ֗ל <S%H410><s%> [is] like the great מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶךָ <S%H4941><s%> thy judgments תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> deep רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> [are] a great אָ֤דָֽם־ <S%H120><s%> man וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> and beast תוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H3467><s%> thou preservest יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יָּקָ֥ר <S%H3368><s%> How excellent חַסְדְּךָ֗ <S%H2617><s%> [is] thy lovingkindness אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> O God וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> therefore the children אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of men בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> under the shadow כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <S%H3671><s%> of thy wings יֶחֱסָיֽוּן׃ <S%H2620><s%> put their trust

יִ֭רְוְיֻן <S%H7301><s%> They shall be abundantly satisfied מִדֶּ֣שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> with the fatness בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> of thy house וְנַ֖חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river עֲדָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H5730><s%> of thy pleasures תַשְׁקֵֽם׃ <S%H8248><s%> and thou shalt make them drink

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עִ֭מְּךָ <S%H5973><s%> You מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> For with thee [is] the fountain חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of life בְּ֝אוֹרְךָ֗ <S%H216><s%> in thy light נִרְאֶה־ <S%H7200><s%> shall we see אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> light

מְשֹׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> O continue חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> thy lovingkindness לְיֹדְעֶ֑יךָ <S%H3045><s%> unto them that know וְ֝צִדְקָֽתְךָ֗ <S%H6666><s%> thee and thy righteousness לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> to the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> in heart

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּ֭בוֹאֵנִי <S%H935><s%> come רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Let not the foot גַּאֲוָ֑ה <S%H1346><s%> of pride וְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> against me and let not the hand רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּנִדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5110><s%> remove

שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There נָ֭פְלוּ <S%H5307><s%> fallen פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> There are the workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity דֹּ֝ח֗וּ <S%H1760><s%> they are cast down וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָ֥כְלוּ <S%H3201><s%> and shall not be able קֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> to rise
